attributes.action: Ban all UK Chemtrail and Geoengineering Programs with disclosure and statement.
attributes.additional_details:
Enchanted LifePath - #WeAreTheNews Liverpool Chemtrail Awareness 2016
PEACEFUL PROTEST INFO PAGE: JOIN OUR PROTESTS
http://enchantedlifepath.com/2016/09/28/open-letter-city-liverpool-i-organsing-monthly-chemtrail-protests-st-georges-hall/
attributes.background: Chemtrails are likely causing Parkinsons’ disease, autism, Alzheimer’s disease, headaches, respiratory ailments, reproductive failure, liver failure, and a host of other diseases. The city of Liverpool attacks have been well documented over the past 12-18 months so it is now time for further action

rejection.details:
It is not clear what chemtrail and geoengineering programs you want the UK Government or Parliament to ban. If you want action taken on the content of aviation fuel, you could start a petition asking for the UK Government to work with other countries to improve the content of aviation fuel.
 
It is also not clear what you mean by a disclosure and statement. If you want an investigation into the impact of chemtrails on health, you could, for example, start a petition asking for a public inquiry into the impact of chemtrails on the health of people in Liverpool or the UK.
 
Please be aware that if you do start a new petition that we cannot accept petitions which are created using the name of an organisation. All petitions must be started using the name of an individual.
